name: Charlotte: Lonely girl
description:
A simple game made in Godot. Just a personal project to learn about the process of making/publishing a videogame.

Story

You wake up in a unknown place. Try to find your way out and discover the truth!

Controls

Move with WASD or keyboard arrows. (If you hold shift key, you will dash).

Interact with Enter or Space.

Use the mouse left click to press buttons.

Credits

Music and sound effects obtained from

https://www.zapsplat.com

Plato font by DamienG

https://damieng.com/zx-origins

Godot Engine.

https://godotengine.org/license
